sourcesContent:
Login

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { isLoginForm = true; onLoginSubmit = () => { console.log('Login form submitted'); }; loginForm = { username: '', password: '', email: '', }; toggleForm = () => { this.isLoginForm = !this.isLoginForm; }; onSignupSubmit = () => { console.log('Signup form submitted'); }; signupForm = { email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' }; }
